name: Infiltration (itch) (Æmilius)
description:
A hired hitman accepts his most difficult contract yet. To sneak into a mansion, and take down the famous business tycoon that destroyed the client’s company.

Infiltration is an action/stealth top-down shooter in which a contract killer must sneak into the target’s mansion, and take him down by any means necessary. It’s not going to be an easy task, the mansion is full of armed guards. Can he fulfill his contract?

Features:
● 3D top-down action meticulously designed for mobile.
● Riveting stealth for players who like a slow, methodical approach.
● Exploration through a luxurious mansion, searching for your target.
● Randomly generated room keys to enhance replayability.

Developers: Green Apple (Chris Thanopoulos, Aimilios Seimenis)
